content.question: Integrated waste management employs all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: using disposable diapers instead of cloth diapers
using reusable canvas bags instead of plastic or paper bags
using tires for the construction of artificial reefs
redesigning automobiles to replace steel parts with aluminum and plastic parts

content.answer: using disposable diapers instead of cloth diapers
